description: Largest odd prime in sequence obtained in 3x+1 (or Collatz) problem starting at n, or 0 if no such prime is found.
links: Index entries for sequences related to 3x+1 (or Collatz) problem
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Collatz Problem
mathematica: op[n_]:=Module[{lst=NestWhileList[If[EvenQ[#],#/2,3#+1]&,n,#!=1&],m}, m= Max[Select[ lst,PrimeQ]];If[m<3,0,m]]; Array[op,70] {* From Harvey P. Dale, Apr 30 2011 *)
